segments.text: My name is Jung Min . What's your name ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My name is Jessica . It's nice to meet you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . It's nice to meet you too . Are you a new student too ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . I'm a sophomore . I take it you are a new student ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . It's pretty exciting to be here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have fun while it lasts . The excitement wears off real quick . Especially after you see how much homework you get . Where are you from ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm from Korea . My parents wanted me to go to an American university , so I came here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have never been to Korea . I've been to Japan before , but never Korea .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My father thought it would be a good experience to take a vacation to a different country . He's so into learning about different cultures .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought it would have been more fun if I went without my parents .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , if you ever want to visit Korea , I would be happy to show you around .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks for the offer . I'll keep that in mind . Oh , the professor is coming . We'll talk more after class .
segments.speaker: S1
